title: Chinese Cabbage with Vermicelli 白菜粉絲煲
steps: Soak vermicelli noodles in hot water for 10 minutes.
Chop chinese cabbage into wedges (cut diagonally to increase surface area), separating the leaves and roots.
Heat up some oil in a wok, and fry the chinese cabbage roots for about a minute until they release some water.
Add the leaves in and fry for another minute, until slightly softened.
Add salt and soy sauce and continue frying for 1-2 minutes.
Add vermicelli noodles and mix well. Put a lid on and let it cook for 5-8 minutes at low heat.
After it is simmered down, turn off the heat and let it sit with the lid on.
In a different pot, heat up some oil for 1 minute.
Add chilli, spring onion and garlic into the vermicelli pot. Pour hot oil over it and serve.
